Detailed Description

Wrapper functions for reading/writing config files.

Function Documentation

int LRC_parseConfigFile ( char *  inif,
char *  sep,
char *  comm,
LRC_configNamespace *  configSpace,
LRC_configTypes *  ct,
int  numCT 
)

Wrapper function.

Parameters:
inif Name of the config file to read.
sep The separator.
comm The comment mark.
configSpace Pointer to config data structure.
ct Pointer to allowed datatypes structure.
numCT Number of allowed datatypes.
Returns:
Number of namespaces found in the config file on success, -1 otherwise.
Todo:
HDF5 file handling.
Examples:
sample-readconfig.c.
